elections.title: VOI Council Election
elections.description: Elect 5 members to the VOI Council for 2025-2026 term

candidates.name: haroof.voi
candidates.campaignStatement: I'm committed to advancing VOI's technical infrastructure and ensuring network security remains our top priority.

candidates.name: boganmeister.voi
candidates.campaignStatement: I'm committed to advancing VOI's technical infrastructure and ensuring network security remains our top priority.

candidates.name: yeyo.voi
candidates.campaignStatement: My focus will be on expanding VOI's cross-chain capabilities and building bridges to other ecosystems.

candidates.name: scotchka.voi
candidates.campaignStatement: I bring deep protocol knowledge and a vision for decentralized governance that empowers the community.

candidates.name: thorpe.voi
candidates.bio: Active in the community been around since testnet very involved with vois members and a builder here in the ecosystem I think I would be a good asset to the council  I hope you all consider my application frens
candidates.campaignStatement: Active in the community been around since testnet very involved with vois members and a builder here in the ecosystem I think I would be a good asset to the council  I hope you all consider my application frens

candidates.name: nussmonster.voi
candidates.bio: I believe in Voi Network. I have been working with the council since May 2025 doing administrative services. I have been running a node since testnet and I will put in 110% to succeed.
candidates.campaignStatement: I believe in Voi Network. I have been working with the council since May 2025 doing administrative services. I have been running a node since testnet and I will put in 110% to succeed.

candidates.name: 0xkoms.voi
candidates.bio: Immersed in startup culture and understanding of the milestones of traditional startup I will emphasize professional request pitches and push for standards of minimum 500k ARR for projects trying to request money in the ecosystem.
candidates.campaignStatement: Immersed in startup culture and understanding of the milestones of traditional startup I will emphasize professional request pitches and push for standards of minimum 500k ARR for projects trying to request money in the ecosystem.
